attributes.action: Provide Simple Details Of How Much Total Tax Is Taken From the Average Resident and how it compares to other EU Countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Have you ever wondered how much as a percentage of the average UK salary the following adds up to:

Income Tax, National Insurance, Fuel Tax, Road Tax, Tax on Insurance, Tax on Alcohol, Value Added Tax, Council Tax, Parish Council Tax, Tax on Tobacco, Tax on Savings, and all the other little taxes that we pay.

We get information on where our council tax goes, but we never really get the chance to see the total picture

This petition is to ask the government to mail a document to every UK taxpayer around the 1st April every year, giving this information, how it compares to our EU counterparts, and 
a broad but all encompassing description of where our money goes!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
